<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Save the tenant quota settings"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/settings/tenantquotasettings"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Saves the tenant quota settings specified in the request to the current portal.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["tenantId"],"type":"object","properties":{"tenantId":{"type":"integer","description":"The ID of the tenant whose quota is being configured.","format":"int32","example":1234},"quota":{"type":"integer","description":"The storage quota limit in bytes allocated to the tenant.","format":"int64","example":1234}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for managing the tenant storage quota settings in a multi-tenant system.","title":"TenantQuotaSettingsRequestsDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Tenant quota settings","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"type":"object","properties":{"enableQuota":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies if the tenant quota is enabled or not.","example":true},"quota":{"type":"integer","description":"The tenant quota.","format":"int64","example":1234},"lastRecalculateDate":{"type":"string","description":"The date of the last tenant quota recalculation.","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"example":"2008-04-10T06:30:00.0000000+04:00"},"lastModified":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2008-04-10T06:30:00.0000000+04:00"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The tenant quota settings.","title":"TenantQuotaSettings"},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"TenantQuotaSettingsWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"402":{"description":"Your pricing plan does not support this option"},"405":{"description":"Not available"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
